Subject: DrilBit, Dollen and Hot Rod too!
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He takes a step back trying to keep both enemys in sight.
He fired optics at Grimler to keep him at bay, and opened gattaling gun
fire on Jackle.

::Dollen::

He was almost out of energy.
"I have to ge ba...."
He droped to the ground in stasis lock.

::Hot Rod::

He made his way to the CF entrance and headed for the brig. He had a
feeling that Unitron was going to free the captured Alliance
bot.(Demolition)
